seasoned.translation[0].definitions[0].d: used to describe someone who has a lot of experience of a particular thing
seasoned.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Artie was by then a seasoned musician with six albums to his credit.
seasoned.translation[0].definitions[1].d: seasoned food has salt, pepper etc added to it
seasoned.translation[0].definitions[1].e: a highly seasoned piece of fish
seasoned.translation[0].definitions[2].d: seasoned wood has been prepared for use by drying
